author: Anonymous Scale
title: Not expression
question: Can someone please help me understand not expressions? I have read through the explanation in the BSL handbook and tried googling but I am having trouble wrapping my head around it. If anyone could word it differently than in the BSL handbook that would be greatly appreciated thank you!!
student_answer:
Are you just looking at this explanation? 

If so, there are basically only two situations with this:

(not true)
returns false.

(not false)
returns true.
